blackjack: insert description of blackjack game description/objective

commands.name: double down
commands.description: doubles player's original bet when the player's hand has exactly two cards that totals to value of 9, 10, or 11.

commands.name: split
commands.description: divides a player's hand into two separate hands such taht each hand has one card when the player has a pair of cards with the same denomination.
